title: Obelisk
description: CHEVRON DESIGN IN 2\" STRIPES SEPARATED BY 1.75\" SOLID COLOR STRIPES.7.5\" VERT. REPT. Chevron design in vert. Stripes of 1.75\" width alternating with 1.5\" vert. Stripes with horiz. Pinstripe pattern.  Vert. Rpt. 7.5\"; horiz. Rpt. 7\".  Blue, orange & khaki. Blue Bronze
